version_description:
Updates
-iPad Pro native resolution support
-Library Updates: AFNetworking, Dropbox, SSL, YAJL
-Core Engines: SSH (Putty 0.65) Update (OS X El Capitan SSH fix)
-Enhancement to Bonjour name resolution.
-SSH Key manager better display
-SSH Key manager support for importing keys via the clipboard

Fixes:
-Fix for iOS8+ keyboard transparency
-Prevent a VNC library crash.
-Session editor: Don't shift view on keyboard for iPad.
-Fix for search bar appearing automatically on iOS9

If you like Remoter, please consider rating us at the App Store. Your review really makes a difference, and helps us continue working on it!

-Various bug fixes
-RemoterFusion updates
-Library updates
-Fixed HW keyboard behavior on Connection Dialog. When a HW key is pressed, the search bar appears. Subsequent keys are passed directly.
-Special keys on conn display cause search box to appear, then text can be typed
-Fixed: Long standing issue where on NetBIOS/Bonjour discovery, the search box on the main screen would get cleared.

Bug fix: the session list button is now working again.

-Various bug fixes
-RemoterFusion updates
-Library updates
-Fixed HW keyboard behavior on Connection Dialog. When a HW key is pressed, the search bar appears. Subsequent keys are passed directly.
-Special keys on conn display cause search box to appear, then text can be typed
-Fixed: Long standing issue where on NetBIOS/Bonjour discovery, the search box on the main screen would get cleared.

* Enhancements
-Internal Updates
-Improvements to Bonjour resolution

* Bug Fixes:
-Issues with screen moving up in the session editor
-Physical keyboard enhancements / bug fixes
-Better separation of on-screen keyboard per-session persistence

-Bug fix for when extended bonjour name resolution failed (host is not reachable)
-SSH crash on bad hostname
-SSH crash on invalid font / color
-Fixed potential crash on connection dialog refresh

Updates to several components including:
- Dropbox, networking, OpenSSL, zip processing

- Keyboard Mapping improvements: New keyboard mapping settings in the Session Editor
- Bug fixes
- iPhone X support

- Improvements, bug fixes.
- Improved Danish keyboard input (thanks to Johannes Djernæs)

New Features:
• RDP Remote Desktop Gateway Support
• Updates and Improves RDP library
• Improvements for safe area guidelines
• Improves error reporting on disconnections

Fixes:
• Fixes several crash bugs on RDP and RDP over SSH
• Fixes first-responder status of username/password requests (thanks to user Daniel O. for reporting)
• Fixes crash when connecting to certain Mac computers via VNC
• Multiple fixes in SSH Key Import, Session Editor, Remoter Config
• Fixes to prevent SSH session crash
• Misc updates / fixes

Internal Updates:
• Swift 5 / Xcode 10.3
• Warnings / Tech debt updates
• Library updates including OpenSSL, Dropbox
• To support latest libraries, frameworks, minimum target is now iOS
12.1

2.1.1
New Features:
• Configuration option for bottom toolbar (removed solid toolbar option)
• Misc fixes, including a fix to hide the bottom toolbar when going fullscreen

2.1.0
A big shout-out to user Jon D. who was instrumental in beta testing, debugging and reporting for this version!

New Features:
• RDP Remote Desktop Gateway Support
• Updates and Improves RDP library
• Improvements for safe area guidelines
• Improves error reporting on disconnections

Fixes:
• Fixes several crash bugs on RDP and RDP over SSH
• Fixes first-responder status of username/password requests (thanks to user Daniel O. for reporting)
• Fixes crash when connecting to certain Mac computers via VNC
• Multiple fixes in SSH Key Import, Session Editor, Remoter Config
• Fixes to prevent SSH session crash
• Misc updates / fixes

Internal Updates:
• Swift 5 / Xcode 10.3
• Warnings / Tech debt updates
• Library updates including OpenSSL, Dropbox
• To support latest libraries, frameworks, minimum target is now iOS
12.1

• Fixed VNC keyboard mapping for en_US users when "auto" is selected
• Fixed SSH font scale for 3x retina devices

Version 6.0.1 (Hotfix)
- Squashed some nasty bugs

Version 6.0.0
- Unified version number 6.0.0 for all Remoter products
- Trackpad / Mouse and Apple Pencil support!
- Improved interface: live previews / multiple sessions per server
- Much improved RDP and SSH
- Many bug fixes and improvements

Other Improvements
- Improvements to keyboard handling and external keyboard support. (Including things like better special key combinations and issues when connecting to Catalina)
- RDP: Fixes for certain RDP disconnections, support for SSH forwardings when connecting to RDP balancers, password manager for RDG sessions, Updated library integrated
- SSH: Updated library integrated, support for importing ed25519 keys
